meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #878.

td.p: Pam Brown, a graduate student from Stillwater, Oklahoma
Bob Palitz, an engineer from Honolulu, Hawaii
Jack Koenig, an actor and househusband from New York City, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $6,000)

tr.td: AMERICAN MUSIC
ANIMALS
ROYAL ANNES
THE MOVIES
FITNESS
NUMBER, PLEASE

Jack
')
